COMMENT_TX: $Shane Victorino tried to run into Dodgers first baseman James Loney after Loney threw to Rafael Furcal; Victorino chased Loney three or four feet onto the grass on the infield and tried to throw a shoulder and arm into Loney but was not successful; Furcal chased Victorino back to the 1B bag, tagging the runner just before he reached the bag safely
$the throw went into the Phillies dugout
$James Loney tried to drop the ball intentionally and get a double play, but he touch the ball first, so rule 6.05(l) was invoked and the batter was ruled out
$the ball sailed and bounced off the protective screen in front of the dugout
$only the third post-season game to end with an extra base hit by a team that was one out from losing; the others: 1947 World Series game 4 and the 1988 World Series game 1
